content: पौराणिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पुराण-ठक्] {@--1@} Belonging to the past, ancient. {@--2@} Belonging to the Purāṇas or derived from them. {@--3@} Versed in the legends of the past. --कः {@--1@} A Brāhmaṇa well-versed in the Purāṇas, a public reader of the Purāṇas. {@--2@} A mythologist.
